mapper.insert: insert into FREE_LIST(free_list_date, free_list_writer, free_list_type, free_list_title, free_list_content) values(#{free_list_date}, #{free_list_writer}, #{free_list_type}, #{free_list_title}, #{free_list_content})
mapper.update: update FREE_LIST set free_list_views = free_list_views + 1 where free_list_num = #{free_list_num}
mapper.select:
select count(*) as total from FREE_LIST where 1=1
AND FREE_LIST_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%' )
AND FREE_LIST_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%' )
AND FREE_LIST_WRITER LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%' )
mapper.insert: insert into COMMENT ( comment_id, user_list_num, comment_content) values (#{comment_id}, #{user_list_num}, #{comment_content} )
mapper.select: select comment_id, comment_content, DATE_FORMAT(comment_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') from COMMENT where user_list_num = #{free_list_num}
